channel.title: Help!
channel.description: whenever i try to register my server it says its offline... ITS NOT!!!!!!!! help plz

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @breaking_the_bridge breaking the bridge
item.description:
@breaking_the_bridge wrote:

First off, please post your problem in the title not for example “HELP PLEASE!!!” liek you did
Also, to start off for making your server online, you need to portfoward your saerver, there may be some tutorials and guides in these forums that will tell you how to do so, if your server is Hamachi based, you’ll need to connect it to that and get your ip set up, if not then get a regular server hooked up from no-ip.com and following any other tuts on how to get it hooked up to a no-ip based server. Lastly, you’ll need to compile your server evferytime it re-logs on or refreshes for some reducment of laggage. And remember, when you pull up your “Runserver.bat”, or “runserver client” box, MINIMIZE it to keep it runing, and click the “X” button to shut it down.

†Breaking The Bridge†

Read full topic
